Sudden Death also makes your next Execute powerfully slam the ground, causing a Thunder Clap that deals {1}% increased damage. In addition, the Execute target bleeds for {2}% of Execute's damage over {3} sec. If this bleed is reapplied, remaining damage is added to the new bleed.
